## PlayerCosmetics type

The cosmetics of a player.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PlayerCosmetics = {
    equippedItems: {
        slot: string;
        item: PlayerCosmeticsEquippedItem;
    }[];
    hairStyle: number;
    skinTextureUri: string;
};
```
